Module com.bd
Package controller

Class ViewAppointmentsController

java.lang.Object
controller.ViewAppointmentsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ViewAppointmentsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The ViewAppointmentsController displays appointment information in a Tableview. The page contains button links to add, modify, and delete appointments.
Author:
Brandi Davis

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the ViewAppointmentsController and sets the cell value data for the appointment Tableview. Sets the items for the appointment Tableview LAMBDA JUSTIFICATION: Uses lambda functions for report filtering by setting the on action for each radio button. This is useful for code readability but also to keep the related filtering logic together.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for root object
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object

    • onActionAddAppointment

      void onActionAddAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Navigates to the AddAppointmentController.
      Parameters:
      event - on action add button
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader in the event of an error loading the AddAppointmentController

    • onActionDeleteAppointment

      void onActionDeleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the selected appointment from the database. Confirms deletion with confirmation prompt and updates Tableview with current information Displays information dialog with the deleted appointment ID and Type
      Parameters:
      event - on action delete button

    • onActionGoBack

      void onActionGoBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Navigates to the NavigationScreenController.
      Parameters:
      event - on action back button
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader in the event of an error loading the NavigationScreenController

    • onActionModifyAppointment

      void onActionModifyAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Gathers the information for the selected appointment and navigates to the UpdateAppointmentController.
      Parameters:
      event - on action modify button
      Throws:
      IOException - from FXMLLoader in the event of an error loading the UpdateAppointmentController
